page.title: 20Laugton-Children's Quotes
page.content:
"I think our area is brilliant because the sweet shop is not far from our house." -Mark "I think our DIY shop is fabulous because we sell everything." -Geoff. "Laughton village is quiet and nice. The sweet shop sells lots of spice. There are fields and hills, no drugs or pills, And Geoff's DIY shop sell lots of drills." -Daniel "Our area is great because of the exciting, dark creepy woods." -Jayne
These members of Class 7, of Laughton J & I School produced this project: Joanne, Timothy, Geoffrey, Debbie, Steven, Nicola, Andrew, Anushka, Paul, Mark, Sarah T, Sarah K, Daniel, David, Heather, Michelle, Michael, Sharon, Jane, Jayne, Andrea, Dale, Dawn, Stephen, and Mr. P. B. Gilmore.
